title: Anyone keep disconnecting today? A weird popup with 'exit instead' option.
body:
I have gotten a few times now today. It even caused me to dodge a ranked game  and lose LP / get the dodge timer.

Anyone else having connection issues today??

EDIT: No it's not my internet. I know that much. It's simply LoL's client only.

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up on this.  If I understand your reports correctly, some of you are disconnecting from champion select or in-game.  I'm gathering this information now to see if there's anything going on.  If I missed anything let me know.  I'll keep ya posted if I find anything!
What's the chance we get our LP/Series back? This happened 2 champ selects in a row and I'm out 35 LP and my series + half hour of my only day off to try and grind.

We don't have any ability to alter game stats or LP.  Sometimes[ loss prevention](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753014-Loss-Prevented) might enable, and if that happens it will be posted at our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.

You have no ability to alter game stats when the issue was obviously caused on your end? most people take this game very seriously and to be doped back down to the bottom of my ranked elo is not my fault clearly it was riots!
Launched the legacy client... problems solved. Narrowed it down to the Beta for y'all Devs. Still hoping for some RPs or something...

Is there going to be any sort of skin gifting/IP boost or anything that we all know you CAN do? Some of us devote a massive chunk of our lives to supporting this game. It doesn't seem fair to have us punished for a server failure on your end.
caused me to get leaver (remake) on my first ranked game of the season. also keeps dcing with the "exit instead" option, then sometimes reconnects
within the client before getting in game

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5G6cx675,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-01-28T22:05:19.890+0000)
>
> Thanks for the heads up on this.  If I understand your reports correctly, some of you are disconnecting from champion select or in-game.  I'm gathering this information now to see if there's anything going on.  If I missed anything let me know.  I'll keep ya posted if I find anything!

Its not just getting into game..  the problem on most peoples clients will take place if  you are just sitting there and watching the client.  Im running beta client so not sure if its just the beta or if its on both beta and legacy

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5G6cx675,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-01-28T22:05:19.890+0000)
>
> Thanks for the heads up on this.  If I understand your reports correctly, some of you are disconnecting from champion select or in-game.  I'm gathering this information now to see if there's anything going on.  If I missed anything let me know.  I'll keep ya posted if I find anything!

Yeah, it started about 20 min or so ago. I been in client for awhile and know there is no issue on my end. I ran Hextech repair tool and problem continued to exist. Getting a warning saying I have been disconnected.
Will you do anything about the lost ranked points?
One of our network connection providers is performing a maintenance on a fiber connection for North America which is causing all of this trouble unfortunately.
Because of this should you have disabled ranked? ranked is no joke to league players. this needs to be fixed i spend way to much time and money for an error on your part for me to suffer.

I don't think you understand how strong your player base is. You literally made over $1 Billion last year, and now you have messed up. If you can't give us our LP back, which is completely ridiculous, then at least give us skins or PBE access or something.
Yup, getting pretty annoying.
Yes been disconnecting and I never have issues.
Same here. I cant even start a game because me and my friend keep disconnecting at the same time. This is definitely a server side problem.
Lol, disable rank queues but don't enable loss prevention.  gg

As an update ranked queue has been disabled.  Loss prevention has been turned on as well for games moving forward.  Unfortunately, the system doesn't allow us to go back and loss prevent previous matches.   I'll continue to provide further updates as I can!
That's great and all, but why delay the Loss Prevention and not enable it at the same time you disable ranked queues?  I got out of my ranked game after queues were disabled but no loss prevention.
*claps hands*

Thanks for the continued info fam.  We now have a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) message up regarding these disconnects.  Hang tight until it's resolved, and I'll let you know if I have anymore info as well.

I got LeaverBuster from crashing through this. The prompt keeps spamming me(Riot's announcement on the issue), making the issue worse.
Is there any way to disabled LB due to this?
Its every couple of minutes
got the "exit instead" box after a game and now can't even get the game to start
Yeah same here pretty annoying.{{champion:17}}
Yes. Me and my friend are getting dced over and over. It just started about 15 min ago.
i also need help :(  my 2 games get exit instead on champ select and not my wifi problem
Same, plus in game lag spikes sometimes of 150 + where things start teleporting then goes back to normal.  Already dropped from a champion select once today because of this issue.
I hope Riot releases a message stating when the problem is fixed. I'm to afraid to accept a match-up in fear I will get disconnected again and gain an even longer queue dodge timer.

If anyone else is having issues launching the actual game I was able to get mine to reload by going into my task manager then navigating to the processes of the LOL Client and manually closing all of them. {{champion:268}}
Yep same here. It did happen once to me during nexus siege but mostly during queue or selection. Net works fine with other programs during that time period.
Also, if I exit client after the error it will not let me open the client.

This all started roughly twenty minutes ago, I checked ping using the Hextech repair tool and everything looks to be running normally. And every device in my house is doing average on their speedtests. I'm really hoping we get an answer as to what's going on soon.{{item:3070}}
Yes keep getting disconnected / lots of dodges and constant pvp.net errors popping up in client.
I am also d/c'n even when trying to save rune pages
